amendment.description: To ensure that funds allocated to the Indian Health Service are not redirected to programs and projects that have not been fully justified in the agency's annual budget request and concurred in by the House and Senate Appropriations Committees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1781 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1781 proposed by Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S11816-11819; text: CR S11819) To ensure that funds allocated to the Indian Health Service are not redirected to programs and projects that have not been fully justified in the agency's annual budget request and concurred in by the House and Senate Appropriations Committees.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1781 proposed by Senator Burns.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1781 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
